game.name: Your Canvas
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: Your Canvas is a Text-Based Psychological Horror game set during three therapy sessions with different time periods where the player will be presented with various choices for deciding the outcome of the story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your Canvas is a Text-Based Psychological Horror game set during three therapy sessions with different time periods where the player will be presented with various choices for deciding the outcome of the story.
